intro: Cleidion platystigma, commonly known as the broad-leafed ceiba, is a species of flowering plant in the Malvaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its large, palmate leaves and showy, yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. It typically grows as a tree or shrub, reaching heights of up to 10 meters. The bark and leaves have been used in traditional medicine for their potential health benefits.
